name: tunefulness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of having a pleasant tune: The first two violin sonatas have a freshness and tunefulness that the third lacks. The slower songs have an exquisite tunefulness. See
tuneful
More examplesFewer examplesThe songs have clever lyrics but often sound alike and lack tunefulness.What makes the work appealing is its tunefulness and accessibility.The album has the grandeur and tunefulness that first made me a fan of their music.
